verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song מִ֝זְמוֹר <S%H4210><s%> [and] Psalm לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> for the sons קֹֽרַח׃ <S%H7141><s%> of Korah גָּ֘ד֤וֹל <S%H1419><s%> Great יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל <S%H1984><s%> to be praised מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and greatly בְּעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city אֱ֝לֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> [in] the mountain קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> of his holiness

יְפֵ֥ה <S%H3303><s%> Beautiful נוֹף֮ <S%H5131><s%> for situation מְשׂ֪וֹשׂ <S%H4885><s%> the joy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of the whole הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the whole earth הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> [is] mount צִ֭יּוֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion יַרְכְּתֵ֣י <S%H3411><s%> [on] the sides צָפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north קִ֝רְיַ֗ת <S%H7151><s%> the city מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> King רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> of the great
אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> God בְּאַרְמְנוֹתֶ֗יהָ <S%H759><s%> in her palaces נוֹדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> is known לְמִשְׂגָּֽב׃ <S%H4869><s%> for a refuge

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> lo הַ֭מְּלָכִים <S%H4428><s%> For lo the kings נֽוֹעֲד֑וּ <S%H3259><s%> were assembled עָבְר֥וּ <S%H5674><s%> they passed by יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They רָ֭אוּ <S%H7200><s%> They saw כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> then תָּמָ֑הוּ <S%H8539><s%> [it and] so they marvelled נִבְהֲל֥וּ <S%H926><s%> they were troubled נֶחְפָּֽזוּ׃ <S%H2648><s%> [and] hasted away
רְ֭עָדָה <S%H7461><s%> Fear אֲחָזָ֣תַם <S%H270><s%> took hold שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there חִ֝֗יל <S%H2427><s%> upon them there [and] pain כַּיּוֹלֵֽדָה׃ <S%H3205><s%> as of a woman in travail
בְּר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind קָדִ֑ים <S%H6921><s%> with an east תְּ֝שַׁבֵּ֗ר <S%H7665><s%> Thou breakest אֳנִיּ֥וֹת <S%H591><s%> the ships תַּרְשִֽׁישׁ׃ <S%H8659><s%> of Tarshish

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> we שָׁמַ֨עְנוּ ׀ <S%H8085><s%> As we have heard כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> so רָאִ֗ינוּ <S%H7200><s%> so have we seen בְּעִיר־ <S%H5892><s%> in the city יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God צְ֭בָאוֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts בְּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God אֱלֹ֘הִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> God יְכוֹנְנֶ֖הָ <S%H3559><s%> will establish עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> it for עוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> ever סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah
דִּמִּ֣ינוּ <S%H1819><s%> We have thought אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> O God חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> of thy lovingkindness בְּ֝קֶ֗רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst הֵיכָלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1964><s%> of thy temple

כְּשִׁמְךָ֤ <S%H8034><s%> According to thy name אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> O God כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> So תְּ֭הִלָּתְךָ <S%H8416><s%> so [is] thy praise עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto קַצְוֵי־ <S%H7099><s%> unto the ends אֶ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth צֶ֝֗דֶק <S%H6664><s%> of righteousness מָלְאָ֥ה <S%H4390><s%> is full יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> thy right hand

יִשְׂמַ֤ח ׀ <S%H8055><s%> rejoice הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> Let mount צִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion תָּ֭גֵלְנָה <S%H1523><s%> be glad בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> let the daughters יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לְ֝מַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> Because מִשְׁפָּטֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4941><s%> because of thy judgments
סֹ֣בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> Walk about צִ֭יּוֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion וְהַקִּיפ֑וּהָ <S%H5362><s%> and go round about סִ֝פְר֗וּ <S%H5608><s%> her tell מִגְדָּלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H4026><s%> the towers

שִׁ֤יתוּ <S%H7896><s%> Mark לִבְּכֶ֨ם ׀ <S%H3820><s%> ye well לְֽחֵילָ֗ה <S%H2430><s%> her bulwarks פַּסְּג֥וּ <S%H6448><s%> consider אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H759><s%> her palaces לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תְּ֝סַפְּר֗וּ <S%H5608><s%> that ye may tell לְד֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> [it] to the generation אַחֲרֽוֹן׃ <S%H314><s%> following

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For זֶ֨ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> such אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> For this God אֱ֭לֹהֵינוּ <S%H430><s%> [is] our God עוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וָעֶ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> and ever ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יְנַהֲגֵ֣נוּ <S%H5090><s%> he will be our guide עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> until מֽוּת׃ <S%H4192><s%> [even] unto death
